imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Create a new square icon logo asset from the uploaded logo (kk-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png > ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Create a new horizontal logo lockup asset from the uploaded logo (kk-logo-horizontal.dim_800x240.png > ccs-logo-horizontal.dim_800x240.png)
- Create a new favicon derived from the uploaded logo (king-kingdom-favicon.dim_64x64.png > ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Ensure the site uses the CCS logo consistently in all primary branding locations by using the generated CCS logo assets in the header navigation brand area, the footer brand block, and the HTML favicon.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set/update app branding so the logo is 'CCS'
